# Datacamp test

This an example of an embedded Datacamp tutorial.  It will only be rendered in HTML output.

<script src=https://cdn.datacamp.com/datacamp-light-latest.min.js></script>

```{r,  eval=knitr::is_html_output(), echo = F}
# greedy = F makes it so that only specific chunks are converted
## to datacamp 
tutorial::go_interactive(greedy = F)
```

By default, `tutorial` will convert all R chunks.

```{r tut = TRUE, eval=knitr::is_html_output()}
a <- 2
b <- 3

a + b
```
